comments.html: "Do You still need this ipspace subscription?" is the question I hear every year. "Do we even do or use things the guy teaches?" My answer is always: "Yes, sure, but what's more important, we know what not to do" Cheers.
comments.name: Jakub

comments.html: It is all about a proper design, with any product. The best product will not scale well and behave as it should with a bad design. By the way, you dont need to be worried about NSX-V/T dfw and asymmetric flows contrary to a perimeter FW. With dfw, there is only a single interface for ingress and egress...the vNIC of the VM.
comments.name: Oliver
